title: Topic 001 Question 186
body: You need to add a group of new users to Cloud Identity. Some of the users already have existing Google accounts. You want to follow one of Google's recommended practices and avoid conflicting accounts. What should you do?
options: Invite the user to transfer their existing account.
Invite the user to use an email alias to resolve the conflict.
Tell the user that they must delete their existing account.
Tell the user to remove all personal email from the existing account.
